name: Life Of Ball
description:
You are a ball that tries to get as many achievements as you can with many obstacles and challenges in your life. Now, you only have a limited amount of time to collect achievements because of the limited endurance you have for your life.

Features:

- Procedural Generated Level

- Dynamic Background Colour

- Player Last Dead Spot

- 3 Unique Power Ups (Super Power, Freeze Power, Lucky Power)

- Satisfying User Interface and Experience!

This Project is meant to be played on Android Devices. This project was created for assignment purpose. The assets in this game are built with zero funding and captured from unity default sprites , self-drawn and royalty free sounds websites .
